name: Carefulzilla
description:
THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR THE LUDUM DARE #38 COMPO BY GABRIEL LEITE

You control the legs of a clumsy giant. There is a big threat attacking the city and you are it's last defense. Be careful not to destroy the city you are protecting!

Click and drag on the legs to move them. Hitting buildings, cars and people will cause deaths and financial collateral damage to the city.

If you enjoyed this game, please rate it at https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/carefulzill...

Engine: Unity
Music: created using Wolfram
SFX: created using CFXR CFXR
Art: created using Photoshop
